name: Fireball
description: You target a point you can see within a moderate (20 unit) distance and cause an outward explosion of fire to blossom. Creatures within a 2 unit radius of the blast take 15 heat damage if upon failing a defense check of 10 and 5 heat damage upon succeeding. Medium and smaller creatures are shoved 2 units outwards from the center of the impact.
charge: The radius is increased to 3 units.
